question: Thanking those who sent condolences upon the death of son with message from Quran and Sunnah
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu Alykum Wa Rahmatullahe Barakatahu, My young son, died recently in an drowning incident. Like a true Muslim Allah endowed me with extreme degree of Faith,Sabr and Salaat accepting it a will of Allah Ta'ala. Having been visited by thousands on the occasion and having received hundreds of condolence messages,I want to ack these message with a message to all my well-wishers as a piece of Tabligh in the light of Holy Quran,Hadith and Sunnah. Could you kindly draft such a message as a consolation to all such muslims who must have faced similar situations in the past and many of them in future also.
